mapper.select: SELECT STATUS_CODE as keyWordStatusCode FROM ADMIN.TREND_DATA WHERE TREND_ID=1
SELECT STATUS_CODE as productStatusCode FROM ADMIN.SSADAGU_CONTENTS WHERE SSADAGU_CONTENT_ID =1
SELECT STATUS_CODE as aIContentStatusCode FROM ADMIN.AI_GENERATED_CONTENTS WHERE AI_CONTENT_ID=5
SELECT STATUS_CODE as publishStatusCode FROM ADMIN.BLOG_PUBLISH_LOGS WHERE PUBLISH_ID =2
